foreignData.name: Kioras Rückruf
foreignData.text:
Streben — Kioras Rückruf kostet beim Wirken für jedes Ziel außer dem ersten {U} mehr.
Bringe eine beliebige Anzahl an Verzauberungen deiner Wahl auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.

foreignData.name: Destitución de Kiora
foreignData.text:
Esfuerzo — Lanzar la Destitución de Kiora cuesta {U} más por cada objetivo después del primero.
Regresa cualquier cantidad de encantamientos objetivo a las manos de sus propietarios.

foreignData.name: Rejet de Kiora
foreignData.text:
Obstination — Le Rejet de Kiora coûte {U} de plus à lancer pour chaque cible après la première.
Renvoyez n'importe quel nombre d'enchantements ciblés dans les mains de leurs propriétaires.

foreignData.name: Congedo di Kiora
foreignData.text:
Sforzo — Il Congedo di Kiora costa {U} in più per essere lanciato per ogni bersaglio oltre il primo.
Fai tornare un qualsiasi numero di incantesimi bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.

foreignData.name: キオーラの放逐
foreignData.text:
奮励 ― キオーラの放逐を唱えるためのコストは、２つ目以降の対象１つにつき{U}多くなる。
望む数のエンチャントを対象とし、それらをオーナーの手札に戻す。

foreignData.name: 키오라의 일축
foreignData.text:
분투 — 키오라의 일축은 한 개를 초과하는 목표의 수만큼 발동하는 데 {U}씩 비용이 더 든다.
부여마법을 원하는 수만큼 목표로 정한다. 그 부여마법들을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.name: Exoneração de Kiora
foreignData.text:
Esforço — Exoneração de Kiora custa {U} a mais para ser conjurado para cada alvo além do primeiro.
Devolva qualquer número de encantamentos alvo para as mãos de seus donos.

foreignData.name: Отказ Киоры
foreignData.text:
Стремление — За каждую цель после первой разыгрывание Отказа Киоры стоит на {U} больше.
Верните любое количество целевых чар в руки их владельцев.

foreignData.name: 奇奥拉的驱散
foreignData.text:
积力～奇奥拉的驱散在第一个目标之外每有一个目标，便增加{U}来施放。
将任意数量的目标结界移回其拥有者手上。

foreignData.name: 奇奧拉的驅散
foreignData.text:
積力～奇奧拉的驅散在第一個目標之外每有一個目標，便增加{U}來施放。
將任意數量的目標結界移回其擁有者手上。

name: Kiora's Dismissal
originalText:
Strive — Kiora's Dismissal costs {U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Return any number of target enchantments to their owners' hands.

rulings.text: You choose how many targets each spell with a strive ability has and what those targets are as you cast it. It's legal to cast such a spell with no targets, although this is rarely a good idea. You can't choose the same target more than once for a single strive spell.
The mana cost and mana value of strive spells don't change no matter how many targets they have. Strive abilities affect only what you pay.

If all of the spell's targets are illegal when the spell tries to resolve, it won't resolve and none of its effects will happen. If one or more of its targets are legal when it tries to resolve, the spell will resolve and affect only those legal targets. It will have no effect on any illegal targets.

If such a spell is copied, and the effect that copies the spell allows a player to choose new targets for the copy, the number of targets can't be changed. The player may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. If, for one of the targets, the player can't choose a new legal target, then it remains unchanged (even if the current target is illegal).
If a spell or ability allows you to cast a strive spell without paying its mana cost, you must pay the additional costs for any targets beyond the first.

text:
Strive — This spell costs {U} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Return any number of target enchantments to their owners' hands.
